summary:
This mod adds the Rings of Power from the Lord of the Rings books and films to the game.
20 rings:
The One Ring
The three elven rings
The seven dwarven rings
The nine rings of men
descriptionHtml:
Three Rings for the Elven-kings under the sky,
Seven for the Dwarf-lords in their halls of stone,
Nine for Mortal Men doomed to die,
One for the Dark Lord on his dark throne
In the Land of Mordor where the shadows lie
One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them,
One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them
In the Land of Mordor where the shadows lie.

This mod adds the Rings of Power from the Lord of the Rings books and films to the game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
THE ONE RING
invisibility
+50% weapon damage
-50% destruction spells cost
+100 Magicka
+25% magic resistance
-90% heal rate
-20% speed

The One Ring is located in the Darkshade, a cave near the Valtheim Towers.
It is owned by Frodo Baggins, who is protected by five Dunedain Warriors.
Pay attention! Frodo is invisible!
To open the iron door in the Darkshade you need "Frodo's Key".
To forge Frodo's Key you need the three "Key Fragments" which are located in the same chests as the three elven rings.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
VILYA(ring of air)
+30% shock resistance
+20% speed
+20% weapon speed
-50 stamina
-80% stamina regeneration

Location: The new dungeon "Dragonsreach Secret Dungeon"(entrance in the Dragonsreach Dungeon)


NENYA(ring of water)
+30% frost resistance
+50 health
+25% heal rate
-50 stamina
-80% stamina regeneration

Location: Abandoned Prison(south-west of Windhelm)


NARYA(ring of fire)
+30% fire resistance
-25% destruction spells cost
+50 magicka
-50 stamina
-80% stamina regeneration

Location: Darklight Tower(south-west of Riften)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
THE NINE RINGS
+70 health
+70 stamina
-30% fire resistance
and ONE of the following effects:
-25% one handed weapon damage
-25% two handed weapon damage
+25% destruction spell cost
-25% magic resistance
-50 magicka
-50% magicka regeneration
-50% health regeneration
-50% stamina regeneration
-25% speed

Locations: Northwatch Keep(west of Solitude), Treva's Watch(west of Riften), Cronvangr Cave(south of Windhelm), Broken Fang Cave(west of Whiterun), Karthspire Camp(east of Markarth), Bard's Leap Summit(south of Rorikstead), near Dark Brotherhood Sanctuary(west of Falkreath), near Dragonbridge, near Abandoned Shack(north of Morthal)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
THE SEVEN RINGS

Effects of six of them:
+10% armor
+25% poison resistance
-25% magic resistance
weapons and armor can be improved 10% better
and ONE of the following effects:
-50 health
-50 magicka
-50 stamina
-50% heal rate
-50% magicka regeneration
-50% stamina regeneration

Effects of Durin's Ring:
+20% armor
+25% poison resistance
-40% magic resistance
weapons and armor can be improved 15% better
prices are 20% better

Locations: Ancient's Ascent(east of Falkreath), Bonestrewn Crest(south of Windhelm), Dragontooth Crater(north-east of Markarth), Eldersblood Peak(south of Morthal), Mount Anthor(south of Winterhold), Shearpoint(west of Windhelm), Skyborn Altar(east of Morthal)
author: ArgonianDovahkiin42 aka Tar-Annun
